H

hasMoreMessages() - Method in interface me.utk.networking.MessageBuilder
Returns true iff the MessageBuilder.nextMessage() method will be able to return a complete message on its next call.

MessageBuilder - Interface in me.utk.networking
A message builder which constructs messages from fragments sent over a network.

N

NetworkAddress - Interface in me.utk.networking
An IP address/port pair which represents a connection address to a server.

nextMessage() - Method in interface me.utk.networking.MessageBuilder
